projectGridLines.title: Detecting and preventing fair-play violation on the Rummy platforms
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Gameskraft's core value proposition is offering world class / unmatched experiences everywhere /

everyday. As part of that philosophy, we believe in offering perfectly clean and fair gameplay experience to our

users. This means that we strive to be one step ahead in preventing and catching any kind of undesired behavior

on the platform that might result in an unfair experience for other genuine users. We use data, statistics, machine

learning and technology to enable this. Using these tools, we not only prevent any kind of fraud from happening

on the platform, but also detect and penalize users who engage in such activities, while minimizing the experience

loss for the genuine users.

Skill sets: Strong data analytics fundamentals, statistics, SQL, Python, ML basics and above all - a passion for

problem solving

Traits expectation: The candidate must be a go getter and a fast learner; this problem statement requires us to

look at data from various angles, formulate hypotheses, validate them using data, and derive actionable

conclusions.

Expected learning: Ability to utilize data to solve a real business problem, understanding of user behavior,

product mindset

Specific courses required for project execution: SQL, Python

projectGridLines.title: Personalization and User Attribute Enhancement
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

Enhance user experiences in our real money poker platform by analyzing user attributes like playing style and

frequency. Develop algorithms to segment users and tailor experiences such as game recommendations and

promotions. Implement dynamic adjustments in gameplay features based on individual attributes to optimize

satisfaction and retention. Candidate will work on data analysis, algorithm development, and testing to improve

user engagement and retention.

Skill sets:

Understanding of:

(1) SQL

(2) Basic of visualization tools (not compulsory)

(3) Good understanding of functions in Google workspace (Sheets, Slides etc) and Excel

(4) Knowledge of basics in Statistics

Traits expectation:

1) Ability to break down any problem into components that can be collaboratively solved

2) Good written and verbal communication skills

3) The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine acceptable solutions.

4) Ability to multitask and work on a diverse range of requirements

Expected learning:

1) Understand end to end business metrics and product funnels of a fast pace B2C business 2) Skill of how to

leverage data to drive business and marketing decisions.

3) Develop the skill of extracting impactful and actionable insights from large data sets

Specific courses required for project execution: SQL

projectGridLines.title: Poker Career Path Analysis
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

Investigate user progression in our real money poker platform. Analyze data to understand skill development,

engagement trends, and key milestones. Develop predictive models to anticipate churn and retention probabilities.

Explore interventions like coaching and promotions to enhance user experience and support career growth. The

project aims to provide insights for tailoring the platform to meet the evolving needs of users throughout their

poker careers.

Skill sets:

Understanding of:

(1) SQL

(2) Basic of visualization tools (not compulsory)

(3) Good understanding of functions in Google workspace (Sheets, Slides etc) and Excel

(4) Knowledge of basics in Statistics

Traits expectation:

1) Ability to break down any problem into components that can be collaboratively solved

2) Good written and verbal communication skills

3) The ability to influence stakeholders and work closely with them to determine
